seo.title: Executive Search & Leadership Advisory
seo.description: Learn how Networkk connects exceptional leaders with transformative opportunities across India and Southeast Asia. Meet our team and our approach.

props.title: Building Tomorrow's Leadership, Today
props.subtitle: Who We Are
props.description: We're a team of passionate professionals dedicated to connecting exceptional talent with visionary organizations, creating transformative partnerships that shape the future of business.

media.alt: Networkk leadership team in collaborative discussion

props.heading: Our Journey
props.description: Founded with the belief that great leadership transforms organizations, we've spent over a decade perfecting the art and science of executive search.

items.title: The Beginning
items.description: Founded in NCR with a vision to transform executive search in India through personalized service and deep industry expertise.

items.title: Market Leadership
items.description: Established strong presence across major Indian metros, building deep partnerships with leading organizations and expanding our network of exceptional talent.

items.title: Technology Integration
items.description: Pioneered the use of AI and data analytics in executive search, enhancing our ability to identify and assess top talent.

items.title: Industry Recognition
items.description: Recognized as 'Best Executive Search Firm' by HR Excellence Awards, cementing our position as industry leaders.

props.heading: Our Foundation
props.description: The principles that guide everything we do and the vision that drives us forward.

items.title: Our Mission
items.description: To transform organizations by connecting them with leaders who drive sustainable growth, innovation, and positive change in their industries and communities.

items.title: Our Vision
items.description: To be the most trusted partner for exceptional leaders and visionary organizations, creating lasting impact through strategic talent connections.

items.title: Our Values
items.description: Integrity, excellence, partnership, and innovation guide everything we do. We believe in building long-term relationships based on trust and mutual success.

props.heading: Leadership Team
props.description: Meet the experienced professionals who lead our mission to connect exceptional talent with transformative opportunities.

items.title: Anupama Singh
items.description:
Co-Founder & Chief Executive Officer

Leading strategic vision and client relationships with 15+ years of expertise in executive search and talent advisory. Anupama specializes in C-suite placements and organizational transformation across technology, finance, and healthcare sectors.

items.title: Sudha Patni
items.description:
Co-Manager & Head of Operations

Overseeing talent acquisition processes and operational excellence with deep expertise in scaling recruitment systems. Sudha drives our delivery capabilities and ensures seamless client experiences across all engagements.

items.title: Amit Kumar
items.description:
Advisor, Retail IT & Point of Sale

Assuring transformation success through testing discipline and talent strategy. Amit enables executives to deliver large-scale transformations with confidence. He combines 25+ years of test leadership with expertise in recruiting and shaping high-performing teams.

items.title: Elina Hamal
items.description:
Advisor, Retail IT & Point of Sale

Delivering retail transformation through POS expertise and building the right teams to sustain it. Elina brings 15 years of experience leading IT Point of Sale programs across greenfield and brownfield implementations.

props.heading: Our Impact in Numbers
props.description: Measurable results that demonstrate our commitment to excellence and the trust our partners place in us.

props.heading: Awards & Recognition
props.description: Industry acknowledgment of our commitment to excellence and innovation in executive search.

items.title: Best Executive Search Firm 2024
items.description: HR Excellence Awards - India, recognizing our outstanding performance in leadership recruitment and client satisfaction.

items.title: Top 10 Recruitment Companies
items.description: Business Today Magazine - Leadership Category, highlighting our innovative approach to executive search and talent advisory.

items.title: Excellence in D&I Hiring
items.description: Diversity & Inclusion Council of India, recognizing our leadership in building diverse executive teams and inclusive cultures.

items.title: Innovation in Talent Tech
items.description: TechHR Singapore 2023, for our pioneering use of AI and analytics in executive assessment and matching.

items.title: Client Choice Award
items.description: APAC Executive Search Awards, based on client feedback scores and long-term partnership success rates.

items.title: Sustainable Business Practice
items.description: Green Business Certification 2024, for our commitment to sustainable recruitment practices and social responsibility.

props.heading: Corporate Social Responsibility
props.description: Our commitment to creating positive impact beyond business success, contributing to communities and sustainable development.

items.title: Education & Skill Development
items.description: Partnerships with leading universities and institutions to develop next-generation leaders through mentorship programs, scholarships, and executive education initiatives.

items.title: Women in Leadership
items.description: Dedicated initiatives to advance women into senior executive roles, including mentorship networks, leadership development programs, and bias-free search processes.

items.title: Environmental Sustainability
items.description: Carbon-neutral operations, paperless processes, and partnerships with organizations driving environmental innovation and sustainable business practices.

items.title: Pro Bono Services
items.description: Free executive search services for non-profit organizations, social enterprises, and startups addressing critical social and environmental challenges.

props.heading: Partner with Networkk Today
props.description: Ready to transform your leadership team? Let's discuss how our expertise, network, and commitment to excellence can help you find the exceptional leaders who will drive your organization forward.
